select.name: tblFixedAssetChange_quote_FixedAssetAdd1
select.defineSQL: select tblFixedAssetAdd.id f1, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsNumber f2, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsName f3, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsSpec f4, tblDepartment.DeptFullName f5, tblFixedAssetAdd.StockCode f6, tblFixedAssetAdd.BillDate f7, tblFixedAssetType.TypeName f8, tblFixedAssetAccType.TypeName f9 from tblFixedAssetAdd left join tblFixedAssetAccType on tblFixedAssetAccType.id=tblFixedAssetAdd.AssetsAccType left join tblFixedAssetType on tblFixedAssetType.id=tblFixedAssetAdd.AssetsType left join tblDepartment on tblDepartment.classCode=tblFixedAssetAdd.DepartmentCode
select.remark: 固定资产变更引用资产增加
select.condition: ((tblFixedAssetAdd.id in (select AssetsAddId from tblFixedAssetDepreciate where tblFixedAssetDepreciate.Period=@Sess:NowPeriod and tblFixedAssetDepreciate.PeriodYear=@Sess:NowYear and tblFixedAssetDepreciate.statusId=1) or len(isnull(tblFixedAssetAdd.referDeprecia,''))!=0) and tblFixedAssetAdd.id not in (select AssetsAddId from tblFixedAssetClean WHERE workFlowNodeName='finish'))
